name: SWAP：换位思考
description:
SWAP: 换位思考 is a 10-min platformer about switch position with a throwing dart.

You are in somewhere dark and deep.

You can throw a dart and swap with it or anything it stuck.

You are asked to climb up to the ALTAR. 

Will you make full use of swap ability for Victory or Survival?

SWAP: 换位思考 comes from a simple thought:

"What if a platformer protagonist can teleport as will?"

So I studied GMS2 from zero base, and made above idea into this prototype. 

To be honest, current version of game is more like a buggy homework than a nice product.

Our protagonist often dies from unbalanced enemy fire and occasionally teleports into wall.

But I sincerely hope you can try it and leave comments to let me know whether this idea works.

Credits:

Created by VX5.

Some sprites and tiles is from Kenney.

Boss room bgm is “Behind the veil” by 8er41 from Pixabay.

Lighting system is Ultra-Fast 2D Dynamic Lighting System by Grizzliusmaximus.

Font in game is "凤凰点阵体".

Keyboard and mouse sprites on title screen is 1bit-controller by RetryEli.
